website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for professional landscaping jobs that last hours. Uses same gas mix as a lawnmower; string bumps out quickly.
pros: Not too noisy to operate considering size of the motor
cons: Confusing information on oil to gas ratio
Some users disappointed with power output

website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for professional-grade muscle and performance, this trimmer is for you. For a gas-powered tool, it’s relatively easy to operate.
pros: The powerful four-stroke engine is impressive and runs on straight gas, with no pre-mixing with oil required
Starts quickly and boasts an extra-wide cutting swath
Good choice for people with large yards who need a rugged, durable trimmer
cons: Expensive and heavier than most trimmers

customer_reviews.title: Cuts thru the grass like a hot knife on butter
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this to clear about 2 acres of tall grass (previously a cow pasture) behind my newly constructed home. Cuts thru the grass like a hot knife on butter. Took 2 minutes to assemble, string change-out is simple and runs like a champ. I know it would be much quicker to bush-hog the lot, but that is no fun.
customer_reviews.author: MDunn

customer_reviews.title: This thing is dangerous....to your marriage.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it a couple of times, but I'm pretty sure I'm in love. Don't tell my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Seein Stripes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the bucks
customer_reviews.text: Ran a little rough at first, I cracked the gas cap for a second and it took off. Has run like a champ since. Very powerful, nice to not have to mix gas and deal with 2 stroke fumes. The bump head works flawlessly and super easy to load line on the spool. Very glad I didn't go cheap. Order a spool of line if you don't want to run to the store, it doesn't have much loaded in the spool as delivered.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.text: Had this about three weeks. This thing is a beast. Easy to start and we'll designed. I may have become a Husqvarna fan for life!
customer_reviews.author: John Homman

customer_reviews.title: Great four cycle trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Great trimmer plenty of power easy on fuel and not as heavy as a Honda but has a great Honda engine, wish I would have purchased a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs like an animal
customer_reviews.text: Minimum assembly, starts smooth, runs like an animal. Comes with bottle of engine oil and is already threaded with line feed. Will cut through almost anything you need it to. Love the gas only feature. Gave it 4 stars because the gaurd shield should be larger. You are covered in grass/weed bits when you're done. Hubby requested safety goggles to wear while using.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great in heavy weeds. Works with Grass Gator 4680 Trimmer Head after enlarging its hole to 15/32.
customer_reviews.text: My wife asked, "Where's the strap?" I might add a strap later, but it's pretty light and really, you don't need one. I like the 4-stroke - not as much vibration - smooth. I've used this in heavy weeds and it didn't choke down. The bump-feed works great, but I also added a Grass Gator 4680 replacement head. I drilled the hole in the Grass Gator a little larger using a 15/32 bit and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: tonymcc

customer_reviews.title: High Price but Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Husqvarna 324L about a year ago and I’ve used it approx 7 times. Recently, the string head stopped spinning and will need to be taken in for service. For a $300 string trimmer, the 324L has been a major disappointment. Would not recommend buying Husqvarna products to anyone. I’ve had a lot of success with the Echo product line. Edger, blower and now.. a new string trimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Somedude

customer_reviews.title: Won't keep running
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this and after running it one time and doing my back yard, it won't stay running for my front yard work. It starts but then stalls out. I have 91 octane no-ethanol fuel in it. Not sure why it is stalling out now when I have only used it for 20 minutes or so. Also, the box arrived damaged and now just noticed that the plastic cover is broken, the outside orange one and the inside black plastic cover. Could those be causing the issue? Will re-review if these issues get fixed.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far but it is brand new time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: Well it's new so it seems amazing. Engine is very Quiet. Its easy to handle, the string bumps out quickly and easily. It's tall enough for me being 6' 3 and it takes the same gas as my lawnmower which is convenient. update I have used it for a couple summers and still going strong. its a little on the heavy side but overall I am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, just a  little heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for personal use. We have two large yards. I absolutely love the way this weed eater goes through grass and weeds like butter. I am a woman and this is a little heavy after a few hours. I am sure I'll get used to it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Better off going for a two stroke
customer_reviews.text: It has good power and easy to swing and use but once it gets hot if you let off the throttle too fast it stalls out and won’t start back up. Typical plastic junk. Would never buy another husqvarna product and would never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Husqvarna 324L String Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Husqvarna 324L that accepted attachments and had it for nearly 10 seasons. It still works today, but it does need some replacement parts so I may continue to use it even longer. To me, this model of trimmer has a great reputation in my book and would put it up against any other weedeater on the market today. My wife had got me another 324, but this one is a different version than the first one, which does not use attachments. It's quick to start with plenty of power to cut tall grass and even some small branches when needed. This is a great trimmer, which will serve me well into the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice to not have to mix gas/oil
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power and starts up on first pull almost every time . Nice to not have to mix gas/oil. Expensive but hope to have it a long time .
customer_reviews.author: foodog71

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer is awesome. Husqvarna customer service sucks, thus only 4 stars. It arrived with a broken part that luckily doesn't affect the trimmer operation. I tried to call Husqvarna several times and never got an answer. When I did email and chat with them they told me to call the number that never gets answered. Beware in case you get one with anything wrong with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Clemens

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several months ago but it works so well I want to provide a review. I wanted a 4 stroke trimmer for the power and ease of use with straight gas without having to mix with oil. I use this on my large property with brush and heavy grass and I'm really glad for the power of this trimmer. It cuts everything. It starts quickly every time I use it, runs well and has great power. This is powerful, does a great job and is reliable. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back because it didn't work the second time I used it.... had to restart continually for it to cut 10 feet, choke, pull cord, set choke, dies, choke, pull cord, set choke, dies..... I sent it back over 2 weeks ago and NOTHING, no refund... don't waste your money, get another trimmer somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Willowaway

customer_reviews.title: A loyal Stihl user switches to Husqvarna
customer_reviews.text: I have used Stihl for over 20 years, and after reading some reviews of this trimmer, I tried Husqvarna, and I'm going to switch. Compared to several Stihl trimmers I've had, this one is easier to start, quieter, and feels at least as well built (if not better). A major plus is it doesn't have the wonky, always leaking, complicated gas tank caps that Stihl has.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: High power trimmer
customer_reviews.text: It's powerful. With heavy string it is whipping stones and grit out of my sidewalk. I used it to beat a brick into dust just for fun. Occasional I oops on my aluminum fence and take the paint off. Grass is no match. Only issue is the gas tank. It's a U-shape and when holding the trimmer sideways to edge sometimes it struggles to get gas and dies. Need to keep the gas above half full to use it for edging.
customer_reviews.author: William Belinski

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Ok....it is a little heavier than expected so I improvised a shoulder harness/sling. With that said, starts easily. The line can be placed on the machine easily. The line comes out EASILY.....and best of all, no GAS OIL MIX. Spend the extra money and get something like this that has ease of use, string replacement and filling tank. I've spent $100's over the years looking for something like this. Never again....this one should be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Good weedeater
customer_reviews.text: Great weedeater, super quite, lots of power. Came with a broken plastic housing, looks like the broken housing was inspected (writing and circles on the broken pieces).
customer_reviews.author: Marty McFly

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addition to my lawn equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my lawn equipment. No more mixing gas and oil. It does a great job. The line that is used in this seems to be tougher than normal. It doesn't seem to wear as quick.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged & broken
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a heavily damaged box. It was also broke as the string feeder would not work. Sent it back. Very disappointed in the condition it arrived in!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Karsko

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work, period end of story. I wasted an entire day trying to get this thing to work and read the entire operating manual, thinking I missed something. IT SIMPLY DOESNT WORK, IT DOESNT START EASILY, IT NEVER STAYS ON FOR MORE THAN 15 SECONDS WITHOUT SHUTTING OFF BY ITSELF, AND HERE IS THE KICKER THE CUTTING WIRE DOESNT EVEN ROTATE FOR THOSE PRECIOUS 15 SECONDS. WHAT A JOKE
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Came broken.  CLUESS/non existant customer service
customer_reviews.text: Came broken. Never worked. Customer service is non existent. Seriously. 25 minutes on hold... and the “online repair experts” ARE CLUESS. Literally couldn’t find video of what they thought issue was...suggested I “wiggle stuff” and see if that works. What a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew deming

customer_reviews.title: Under Powered Over Priced Junk !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on a normal height residential lawn which was cut and trimmed a week ago. This thing is absolute junk it has no power in thin grass. if you hold the handle right handed you get motor burns on your forearm. I so wanted to like this after the reviews i seen , was easy to put together. However after using it just 1 hour, I've decided this thing is over price under powered garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great weedeater
customer_reviews.text: This is a great weed eater. I sometimes have issues with using it as an edger. Also the guard stays out of your way but at the same time it's not doing much to protect you from a myriad of debris that this monster can throw. Also my box arrived looking like it had been put in a trash compactor. The contents seems ok but I was pretty worried.
customer_reviews.author: Ian H

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I love how light this weed eater is. Also it is really quiet, which was surprising. This machine tore through overgrown weeds with ease. I am very happy with my purchase. Best weed eater I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Owens

customer_reviews.title: Another winner from Husqvarna!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Husqvarna chain saws, weed-eaters & blowers professionally in the landscape business for years. They are dependable, rugged, & long lasting. I used a Husqvarna weed-eater for over 27 years professionally & personally, before it finally gave out. So I replaced with this new Husqvarna 4-stroke weed-eater. It's amazing. It's powerful, quiet & blows through weeds. It has great balance. I used it for almost 2 hours without fatigue. When it comes to landscape equipment it will always be Husqvarna, period.
customer_reviews.author: manna man

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Only used three times. Starts easily, runs fairly quiet, very powerful, a little heavy, and eats the weeds up! Other reviews indicated you get grass and weeds on you which you do but no more than any I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer books are too discriptive

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this weed Wacker.
customer_reviews.text: This weed Wacker has plenty of power and is easy to use. I've only had this machine for a couple of months but it has outperformed my old weed Wacker that I purchased from Home Depot. I will update this review as any new information arises.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L Williams

customer_reviews.title: It is on the heavy side. I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is on the heavy side. I had to purchase a separate clip/eyelet to attach a harness, it should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: sabbott

customer_reviews.title: starts easily, light weight and operates for hours with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research before selecting this unit. It is everything I hoped for ... starts easily, light weight and operates for hours with no issues. Would definitely recommend it, and the 4 cycle motor requires no oil/gas mixing.
customer_reviews.author: S Otree

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ahead of scheduled delivery date. Minimal assembly required, just the guard. Starts very easily, runs great. Used it for 4 hours straight with no issues. Adding trimmer line is very easy as well. Love the 4 cycle, not having to mix the oil and gas is a big plus. Glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband because I usually do the mowing and he usually does the weed whacking. We had our old one for quite a while and he replaced the line for the gas on it and after that it wouldn't run worth a darn. So I bought him this one and he loves it! When I use it, it gets a little heavy after a while (because I don't use the carry strap I got him for it) but it does the job well and with ease. It's real easy to start also. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good weed whacker
customer_reviews.author: Flo in SC

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this in the mail the box was damaged. when I opened it the weed eater was in okay condition. and then after about 3 minutes of use the weed eater quit working properly the motor will run and the head will not spend.. needs constant work.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Like New Condition...Husband LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal...looked like new...Husband LOVES it! He says it works well...quieter than his stihl brand and he has used many of the stihl thru the years. This is his first Husqvarna...he always wanted to try the 4 stroke...never going back
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Bobs garden
customer_reviews.text: Great product, finishes my yard in half the time of my old trimmer. My old trimmer had to be recharged after completing just my front yard leaving me to trim my back yard another day.
customer_reviews.author: John H Martin

customer_reviews.title: Shrapnel Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Awesome trimmer. However, it WILL cover you head to toe with weed mulch. Teeny tiny bits of salad made from whatever you trim. And no it doesn't matter how you do it...you get done and looks like you have been hit with a grass grenade.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Maberry

customer_reviews.title: Good Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, well packaged, solid construction. Edging around sidewalks is going to take some getting used to. Restringing is easy. Choke position used to increase available power. At first seemed heavy but after using for 1/2 hr I adjusted to a position that was comfortable. No support strap.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Texas

customer_reviews.title: Best and easiest loading trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! Best trimmer I have ever used! Worth every penny! Low torque- very efficient trimmer. Extremely Easy to install trimmer line!!!!! 4 cycle no oil to mix-durable and easy to start
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trimmer. Plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: Awesome trimmer. Plenty of power. Starts right up. I've had it for a month now and it's been great. I don't miss the two stroke even a little bit. The power will surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Curved or Straight - You decide
customer_reviews.text: I like that this weed eater is fairly easy to start. I don't really like the straight shaft. It is not very useful in trimming around the driveway and curbs. My former Craftsman product this a beautiful job in this respect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: As advertised - like new
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with the purchase. I'm always nervous when I buy refurbished but the savings was just too much to ignore. The weed eater runs great so far and the way I look at it, if it runs for 1 season, then it was a deal because I usually pay for landscapers to weed my 1 acre. This is a top of the line weed eater and it destroyed 8000 sq ft of weeds on the first day alone!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ... finally got around to use it yesterday it ran good 1 pool and it was started I didn't I ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi this is Mark I'm talking about my gas trimmer I finally got around to use it yesterday it ran good 1 pool and it was started I didn't I evolve down when I was cutting to grass excellent so far
customer_reviews.author: mark a copley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A quality product. Search no further! I am very particular, after having done thorough research.
customer_reviews.author: greenerk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Weed Wacker!!
customer_reviews.text: This weedwacker is no wimp, it has Great Power and Performance!! This is my 2nd. one I have bought because the first one was so Great, IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: SGB

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality parts, beware of "warranty"
customer_reviews.text: The spring in the string housing has seemed to fail after very minimal household use. The string unspools after about 10 seconds of running. Strung properly based on Husqvarna's own youtube guidelines, using Husqvarna brand string. I'd love to take it in for service under warranty, but then I'd have to travel 50 miles round trip. Maybe this is a worthwhile product if you live near a dealer.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Instructions to replace trimmer line not included
customer_reviews.text: Instructions to replace trimmer line not included, love the 4 cycle Honda engine non mix gas feature.an excellent piece of equipment,worth the extra money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: George Newman

customer_reviews.title: Works ok except for the line holder coming off all the time
customer_reviews.text: Product generally works as advertised. Easy to start. Works well. I would give it 5 stars except for the continued issue of the line holder coming off during use. After bumping to release more line, the head loosens or something and the falls off and I have to rewrap the line. I am reduced to bumping for more line, stopping the machine, ensuring the head is tight, and then resume use.
customer_reviews.author: Clingwrap

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Weedwhacker is not idling correctly. It'll probably cost between 40 and $80 to get it serviced at a Husqvarns dealer. Expensive piece of equipment and now spending more to have it serviced. And of course when we want to return it, it’s 8 days past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good weed trimmer
customer_reviews.text: starting directions are poor. but it is a good weed trimmer. 4 stars only because i feel starting can be improved. at least the directions.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have to weed whack 2.5 acres with tons of things to go around. This trimmer has enough power to go through grass that has been growing for 2 weeks, small trees that have just sprouted, and weeds and it goes through all of these like it's nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchman175

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT 5 lbs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because it said it was 5 lbs in the description with the comparisons of other like items. I'm so disappointed.... I never would have spent this much money if it wasn't 5 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Randi J. Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Weed eater kicks butt!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful! Does a great job! Glad I purchased it. Had been looking for a decent weed eater for a while. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: R Jaime

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: over the years I have owned a number of different brands of weedwackers Husqvarna beats all the others hands down. I use the wacker for hours at a time with no issues. even the atop line advance works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: great trimmer
customer_reviews.text: The Husqvarna gas trimmer is a really great trimmer. Starts quickly and trims great.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon W. Cox Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable, do not order from this third party
customer_reviews.text: Product came in damaged packaging, what seemed to be already opened and repacked. The product did not work at all. The product was missing a crucial piece in order for it to function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Andyg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the product delivered.
customer_reviews.text: When I viewed the package the weed eater was delivered in I was disappointed. The box was completely crushed, tore in the middle as if it was opened then repackaged. There was no oil, which was supposed to be provided, and the trimmer guard is missing. Without having all safety equipment needed for the task, I started it hit a few weeds and seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great job!
customer_reviews.text: My husband says he loves it. Hoping he uses it more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Shesalulu

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Best weed eater Ive ever owned, easy to crank, and easy to operate very sturdy for a home weed eater. Can handle very heavy grass and weeds., Ten times better than any electric one Ive ever had,
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Broken in couple spots and missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: This came in a damaged box. As I opened it,discovered the engine cover is broken in couple of spots. Also no safety shield and air filter. I have bought these brand in the past but this one was really disapointing. Refund me please.
customer_reviews.author: amir

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and works around fences
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible weed wacker. Very powerful, and stands up very well around fencing. Does an incredible job--very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S846TT

customer_reviews.title: Power to spare!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and powerful. A great product. 4Stroke is definitely better. Starts easy and cuts easily on 1/2 power
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: 4 cycle Gas Trimmer is the only way to go!
customer_reviews.text: The unit started the first time I used it, without a hitch. I have had several 2 cycle Gas trimmers, ECHO, TROYBILT, and they are ALL the same......come springtime, they are impossible to start cold.
customer_reviews.author: George Pallotta Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer has given nothing but problems trying to get it started. It is nothing but frustration. Subsequently I removed the spark plug and noticed that the gap was too wide. I adjusted the gap to what is recommended by Husqvarna and the trimmer is now starting much easier and also working much better.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pooler

customer_reviews.title: The best one
customer_reviews.text: I've had some other trimmers but nothing equals this one on durability and design.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Manzano

customer_reviews.title: Product randomly turned off after 5 minutes, then i ...
customer_reviews.text: Product randomly turned off after 5 minutes, then i started it, 2 minutes later it turns off. Also the product isnt suited for cutting thick grass, i put this to the test in my hay field. it kept getting bogged down, maybe it was just a defective piece all around. I have yet to find a weed wacker that can handle the type if work I'm doing.
customer_reviews.author: kyle aubin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any issue with this product. It starts and rune great all the time I have used it. Thanks !!
customer_reviews.author: EDUARDO TOVIAS

customer_reviews.title: Needs better Quality Control at Husqvarna Factory
customer_reviews.text: Weedeater runs great like I knew it would. My only complaint is that when I took it out of the wrapping/shipping cardboard that where the air filter cover seats with the main plastic frame, was that one of the clips was broken off so it is not as secure as it should be. Registered with Husqvarna for warranty and tried to contact them to see if a new filter cover could be obtained they did not answer. I know this is not the sellers problem or fault, its the QC at Husqvarna for not seeing the broken piece. I have used Husqvarna for many years and this is the first problem I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Jud

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for to get great results.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gas weed wacker I've purchased and it has done me alot of good. I needed something to take care of heavy weeds and get good results on trimming sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: T man

customer_reviews.title: Just won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Great weed eater lots of power lasted less than a year put in lic dealer repair shop repairs would cost $265. For one year s use ?
customer_reviews.author: Jim mckay

customer_reviews.title: Ran one time not above an idle the next time
customer_reviews.text: Worked the first time out then the second time would not run above an idle.
customer_reviews.author: powaytj

customer_reviews.title: So far very good.
customer_reviews.text: Solid machine that is much quieter than I thought it would be. I've been through a few tanks of gas and it's great so far. We will see how long it lasts to know if it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: What a headache - stopped working in 20 minutes. Instruction book said make sure the cutter head is 3/4 full of grease. Hardly had any grease in it . . . what a mess! Screws loose, didn't seem to be put together right at factor. Wouldn't expect to have to spend so much time dealing with it and still having a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maintain and works when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: First time with 4 cycle. Works quieter and stronger than 2 cycle. No mixing just pour gas and cut. Never going back to old headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thought I made a mistake.
customer_reviews.text: Super low noise, crazy powerful and sips on fuel. You wont be dissatisfied with this and it starts easily hot or cold.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product because it cut the weeds and edged like a champ
customer_reviews.author: David Worley

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received arrived broken, and have just unboxed the second one and it is missing the orange safely guard that should cover the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to set up and start
customer_reviews.text: Best string trimmer I have used . It was running with in 30 mins of being opened . Just add the oil and gas and it's running
customer_reviews.author: joe aaron brooks

customer_reviews.title: Stalled after 2 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: I opened filled it with gas and started and then it stalled after 2 minutes of use. Called support and they told me I have to have it repaired. You would think that if you got a new model it would work straight out of the box. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Makes quick work of even huge weeds, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, easy to work with and it does a great job. Exactly what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: david f. adam

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO START
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT ONE OF THESE TRIMMERS A COUPLE OF YEARS AGO. SO I THOUGHT I MAY NEED TO REPLACE IT THIS YEAR (I'M KIND OF TOUGH ON THEM). BUT IT JUST WON'T QUIT. FRESH GAS AND OFF IT WENT. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: douglas ladd

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This an amazing powerful equipment. It cuts the grass so fast and with ease. I recommend this trimmer 100%
customer_reviews.author: Natyangie1203

customer_reviews.title: the primer button is hidden inside a small opening on the side of the engine.
customer_reviews.text: works fine, wish it came with a brush blade, only good for thick grasses. FYI: wear a face shield or make a clear shield on the trimmer shaft, it shoots pieces of stiff sharp vegetation in every direction.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good 4 cycle machine
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and starts better than 2 cycle machine that died after 4 years. Prime 8 times, set choke and starts on 1st pull. Idle was too low as received but easily adjusted. Prime 8 times, set choke and starts on 1st pull. Very powerful. Cuts perennials, grasses as well as lawn trimming without bogging.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ypsilantis

customer_reviews.title: It's a lovely thing.
customer_reviews.text: Thank GOD I don't need to mix the gas and oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: These trimmers are junk.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews but after 2 failed products after 10 minutes of use I will on this. Both trimmers had identical problems within the first 10 minutes of light use. Do not buy this item. Buy local and steer clear of this one.
customer_reviews.author: matthew vestal

customer_reviews.title: Tons of power but a little heavy with a steel blade but cuts down small trees
customer_reviews.text: Tons of power quieter than two stroke definitely cleaner than two stroke and it sounds exactly like a little pit bike running around when I first started it my buddy thought it was a pit bike
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift from family and love it. So very easy to start and very easy to use. It is very quiet since it is a 4 stroke. Will not buy anything else but a Husqvarna from now on. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start
customer_reviews.text: Used it many times. Easy to start. Runs good for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about 8 hours to tackle my 7 foot weeds. The thicker, stronger ones I started it at the top and it just shredded the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received an excellent product"
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a good one !!" Mine happens to be perfect !!" Its a real work horse !!" Better than I expected !!"
customer_reviews.author: Dave F.

customer_reviews.title: Some good with the bad.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to not have to mix oil and gas. Had to get it adjusted at my local dealer due to throttle conking out when going full out. 75-80% speeds it ran all day.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older husqvarna similar model. This one is little heavier and longer than what we are used to but Still great. Very sturdy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ours had stoped working, so I bought this one. my husband absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, not at all heavy like my old one. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry K. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Received broken trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Received broken engine cover and not starting properly. Need some repair and replacements. So returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Faxi

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I had
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I am liking the 4 cycle advantage the string that comes with it does not last long. Luck that I had string from the last one, which was not a Husqvarna. I had two other trimmers which were 2 cycle and sometimes finding good 2 cycle oil was a problem. Now check the oil on the motor and fill with unleaded and go. This trimmer just goes though weeds tall or short with ease. A nice big swath and with the better line I put on I hardly needed to tap to increase the line length. Very pleased and was glad I choose this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing trimmer! The 4 stroke motor is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Wow. Wow. Amazing trimmer! The 4 stroke motor is amazing. It’s a Honda motor packed inside a husqvarna trimmer package. Runs strong. Started immediately. Highly recommend this product! Best part, no mixing fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua L

product_meta.title: Husqvarna 324L 4-Cycle 18" Cutting Path Gas String Trimmer
product_meta.description: Color:OrangeThe 324L is your go to gas trimmer when you need professional grade power in an easy to use tool. This Honda powered Semi-Pro string trimmer will allow you to tackle the grass & weeds in your yd. With confidence. Our Smart start trimmer technology reduces starter cord resistance by 40% to allow for easy engine starts & the strong, braided trimmer line is ready for work. A high visibility cutting shield helps protect you from flying rocks & debris, while giving you better visibility to your cutting area. The straight shaft design provides greater reach underneath bushes & those hard to reach spots.
feature_bullets: Features a 25cc 4-cycle engine which powers the 18 inch (cutting width) trimmer head
Trimmer engine runs on unleaded gas, requiring no mixing of fuel and oil
Easily release New trimmer line as you work by tapping the trimmer head against the grass to activate the tap 'N Go line release feature
Have no worries when it is time to replace the trimmer line - the T25 trimmer head is designed for simple and easy line reloading
A translucent fuel tank allows you to visually Monitor your fuel level as you work
Conveniently remove unwanted air from the carburetor and Fuel system using the air purge primer bulb
String trimmer is backed by a 2-year limited for residential use. Maximum power speed- 7000 rpm. Power output- 0.9 hp

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars264 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
